description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot controller named HelloController that provides multiple web endpoints for serving views, redirecting to documentation, and health checks. It uses annotations to map HTTP GET requests to specific handler methods and includes Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring MVC Controller providing endpoints for home page, greeting page, API documentation redirect, health check, and app info.

methods.name: index
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns the 'index' view with some model attributes.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/hello' and returns the 'hello' view with greeting and timestamp.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs', redirects to the Swagger UI page while preserving the request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health', returns a plain 'OK' response for health checks.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info', returns application information as plain text.
